title: Factors Shaping the Choice in Chemistry: Insights from Undergraduate Students within a Societal Context
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4RP00058G, Paper
Shirly Avargil, Greta Sterimbaum, Hafeeza Dahley-Zoabi
There is a decline in recent years in the number of students studying chemistry in higher education. Many studies have been conducted on elementary and high school students' choice with...
